code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../CSS Files/ShowUsersData.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowUsersData=()=>{const[userData,setUserData]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const userId=localStorage.getItem('userId');if(userId){axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/getUser/${userId}`).then(response=>{setUserData(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching user data:',error);setError('Error in server side');});}else{setError('User ID not found in local storage');}},[]);if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});}if(!userData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-user-data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"heading-user-data",children:"User Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"First Name:"})," ",userData.firstName||"Error in server side"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Last Name:"})," ",userData.lastName||"Error in server side"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",userData.email||"Error in server side"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Phone Number:"})," ",userData.phoneNo||"Error in server side"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Address:"})," ",userData.address||"Error in server side"]})]})]});};export default ShowUsersData;
